column3: Oh my god that guy is so cute I really want to go say hi and meet him I just can't wait.
And here's my hotel, of course only the best for me. I'll pull up in my limo quite promptly, but just late enough to be fashionable.
I want to watch the game, not listen to this guy speak!
Como on josh, let me play!!!
This lobby is beautiful and the trees really add to it!
